participant_1.background:
I have a powerful computer that can handle both the demands of wedding cake design and music production.
I play the guitar to accompany my singing.
i m allergic to lactose.
I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.
i went to college.

participant_2.background:
I went to a local antique store and bought a beautiful vase that I now display in my living room.
I'd brag about my knowledge of the Beatles' music and history.
i spend as much time as i can with my family.
I exercise daily to keep my health in check and to have enough energy to keep up with my pets.
i live on a boat.

content.text: I love to take photos of the beauty of Pittsburgh.
I love to go shopping in Pittsburgh.
I do enjoy shopping too.  What kind of things do you like to buy?
I like to buy antiques and collectibles.  I have a beautiful vase that I bought at a local antique store.
That sounds like a great find.  I love antiques.  I have a lot of old books that I love to read.
I love books too.  I have a large collection of Beatles books.  They are my favorite band.
I love the Beatles too.  They are one of my favorite bands as well.  I have a lot of their music.
I have a lot of their music too.  I love to listen to them while I exercise.
That sounds like a great way to work out.  I usually listen to music when I work out too.
It is a great way to get pumped up and motivated.
I agree.  Music is a great motivator.
Me too.  I am glad that we have something in common.
